text: Tini'i allaha, yini nabhomandala o bhumandala srjana karechena ebam akasa theke pani barsana kare atahpara ta dbara tomadera jan'ye phalera riyika utpanna karechena ebam naukake tomadera ajnabaha karechena, yate tamra adese samudre cala phera kare ebam nada-nadike tomadera sebaya niyojita karechena.
